summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center; authorizing a lease of the Seattle Center Playhouse to the Seattle Repertory Theatre, authorizing preparation of plans, specifications and estimates for the reconfiguration of seats in the Seattle Center Playhouse and the undertaking of such reconfiguration work, increasing an Object of Expenditure in the 1976 Budget of the Seattle Center Department in connection therewith, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
